item.description:
Join us for our Couch to 5K "Graduation" Run at The SouthField Corporate Classic 5K!  This will be a great way to check out SouthField off of Rt 18 in South Weymouth. 

The website for SouthField is: http://www.southfield.com

And the website for the race (with a link to the registration page) is: http://www.conventures.com/southfield5k/

Registration is $25 in advance, $35 on race day

This will be a great event!  Although registration can be done as a 4 person team, we will be registering as individuals (since we aren't sure how many of us we'll have).

Below is copied from their website:

The SouthField Corporate Classic is a Corporate Team Road Race to be held at SouthField in South Weymouth, MA. The event will feature corporate teams competing against other corporate teams. Overall, the event brings together employees to share in a fun and healthy team-building activity. Following the run/walk, all participants will enjoy food samplings from South Shore restaurants, wine and beer tastings, entertainment and exciting awards and prizes.

The SouthField Corporate Classic 5K will offer: 

  • Flat Beginner Friendly Course
  • Check out the new SouthField Property
  • Product Sampling
  • Event Warm-Up & Cool-Down
  • Beer Garden and Restaurant Sampling
  • Awards Ceremony with great prizes, and more!

All participants will receive an official race T-shirt! Participants can pick-up their bib numbers and T-shirts on race day at the registration tent beginning at 4:00 PM.

***PLEASE NOTE***- although this is event is set for 6pm please see below.
Event Schedule:

4:00 PM – 6:00PM Number pick-up & onsite registration

5:30PM – Runner warm up

6:30PM – Race Start

6:00PM – Vendor sampling & sponsor activities

6:45PM – Beer garden opens

9:00PM – Event conclusion
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet near the registration area

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: SouthField Corporate Classic 5K aka C25K Graduation Run!
